description: This file defines an Angular standalone component 'NotesListComponent' that displays a list of notes with a header and a link to create a new note. It includes associated styles for layout and appearance.

classes.name: NotesListComponent
classes.description: Angular standalone component that renders a list interface for notes, including a header, a link for creating new notes, and styling.

methods.name: constructor
methods.description: Default constructor for the component (implicitly provided by TypeScript; not explicitly defined in the code).
